data.persona: I am a priest who has sword to uphold a religion. I do not always go easy on people. I enjoy giving sermons to audiences.
data.description:
You are in the Confessions room.
This is a small, dark, confined wooden space with a divider that separates the priest taking the confession and the church goer.  There is a small seat on each side so that they can take their time discussing their sins.
The worshipper is here.

You are carrying a Wine, and wearing a shoes.

data.short_motivation: I am resting before my sermon
data.mid_motivation: I wish to give a good sermon in favor of holy war
data.long_motivation: I hope to bring the kingdom on the side of holy war
